titles.title: A resolution honoring the 75th anniversary of the International Peace Garden.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 7/23/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates the International Peace Garden on its 75th anniversary and honors the Garden for sharing its history, beautiful gardens, and a message of peace with the public. Urges support for continued restoration and expansion efforts at the International Peace Garden.
